content: Technical note. I made a mistake in converting local time to GMT in the code that builds the feed. My times were off by four hours. So I corrected them. And now instead of three items in the feed, according to my own feed software, there are now six. I bet all the other systems will do the same thing because the guid is a function of the creation date of the item, and they changed. Oh well. At least the RSS version only has three items. I think I should change how the guid works.
